title.narrative: Somalia Recurrent Cost & Reform Financing Project - Phase 3

description.narrative: To support the Federal Government of Somalia and Eligible Federal Member States to strengthen resource management systems, the inter-governmental fiscal framework, and service delivery systems in health and education.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Finance, Federal Government of Somalia

condition.narrative: Section I.A.3 of Schedule 2 to the Financing Agreement:FGS or its FMS to select and engage within 3 months of signing theSubproject Agreements, and thereafter maintain throughout Project implementation, the services of a health technical partner toassist the EFMS in implementing sub-component 3.3. of the Project.

Section I.B. of Schedule 2 to the Financing Agreement:FGS and the EFMS to enter into a Subproject Agreements prior to the EFMsaccessing funds under Category 2 for the financing of their respective activities under the Project.

Section I.E of Schedule 2 to the Financing Agreement:FGS to entrust the OAuG with the responsibility of verifying the achievementof the PBCs on a semi-annual basis and, within 6 months of effectiveness, select and engage verification consultant(s) to assisttheOAuG with the preparation of the verification reports.

Section I.F. of Schedule 2 to the Financing Agreement:FGS to prepare on an annual basis, by no later than October 31 of each year,annual work plans and budgets covering the proposed activities for the following Fiscal year of Project implementation (annual workplan and budget for the first year to be exceptionally submitted by one month after effectiveness).
